abstract: Lockheed Martin announced on Wednesday that it had agreed to sell its enterprise integration group to the private-equity firm Veritas Capital for $815 million in cash.
snippet: Lockheed Martin announced on Wednesday that it had agreed to sell its enterprise integration group to the private-equity firm Veritas Capital for $815 million in cash.
lead_paragraph: Lockheed Martin announced on Wednesday that it had agreed to sell its enterprise integration group to the private-equity firm Veritas Capital for $815 million in cash.

headline.main: Lockheed to Sell Enterprise Integration Unit
